title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-9.20 - Steam gage dial
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-9.20 - Steam gage dial

State Regulations

The dial of the steam gage shall be graduated to
approximately double the pressure at which the safety valve is set but in no
case to less than one and one-half times this pressure. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
14-9.20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
